input.description: Configuration XML in the format: <Specifics> <BMC_TrueSight> <EventTypes> <ServiceDown> <EventType>Service Down</EventType> <CreateIncident>false</CreateIncident> <CreateChange>true</CreateChange> <ChangeTemplateName> </ChangeTemplateName> <CreateTask>true</CreateTask> <PerformRemediation>true</PerformRemediation> <IsITSMDataCustom>true</IsITSMDataCustom> <IncidentIDFieldName>mc-incident-id</IncidentIDFieldName> <ChangeIDFieldName>mc-change-id</ChangeIDFieldName> <TaskIDFieldName>mc-task-id</TaskIDFieldName> <ChangeType>normal</ChangeType> </ServiceDown> </EventTypes> </BMC_TrueSight> <Adapters> <EventActorAdapter>Truesight Actor</EventActorAdapter> <RESTAdapter>REST Adapter</RESTAdapter> <ITSMActorAdapter>ARSAdapter</ITSMActorAdapter> </Adapters> <Debug> <CallProcess> <UpdateEventNotes>false</UpdateEventNotes> </CallProcess> </Debug> <TnR> <EventTypes> <ServiceDown /> </EventTypes> </TnR> <BAO> <URL>https://clm-aus-021690.bmc.com:3020/baocdp</URL> <UserName>aoadmin</UserName> <Password>****MASKED****</Password> </BAO> <BMC_AR_System /> <ITSM> <CreateIncidentWorkflowName>:BMC-SA-Response_ITSM_Automation:Incident_Management:BMC_AR_System:Create Incident</CreateIncidentWorkflowName> </ITSM> <WorkflowDefinitions> <CommonWorkflows> <workflows> <workflow name="UpdateEventNotes">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:Event:Update Event Notes</workflow> <workflow name="CreateIncident">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:ITSM:Create Incident</workflow> <workflow name="CreateChange">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:ITSM:Create Change</workflow> <workflow name="AddChangeNotes">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:ITSM:Update Change Notes</workflow> <workflow name="AddIncidentNotes">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:ITSM:Update Incident Notes</workflow> <workflow name="AddTaskNotes">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:ITSM:Update Task Notes</workflow> <workflow name="AddChangeStatus">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:ITSM:Update Change Status</workflow> <workflow name="AddIncidentStatus">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:ITSM:Update Incident Status</workflow> <workflow name="AddTaskStatus">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration:ITSM:Update Task Status</workflow> </workflows> </CommonWorkflows> <WorkflowsByEventType> <workflows> <workflow name="ServiceDown" action="triage">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration_Service_Down:PerformTriage</workflow> <workflow name="ServiceDown" action="remediate">:BMC-OA-Event_Orchestration_Service_Down:PerformRemediation</workflow> </workflows> </WorkflowsByEventType> </WorkflowDefinitions> <Defaults> <UnfoundWorkflowName>NOT_FOUND</UnfoundWorkflowName> </Defaults> </Specifics>

Common event model based event data.
<event> <metaData> <eventModelVersion>1.1.00</eventModelVersion> <eventClass>PATROL_EV</eventClass> <reportTime>1520007159</reportTime> <reportTimeEpoch>0</reportTimeEpoch> <notes>testing</notes> <eventId>Admin.bmcproactivenetperformancemanageractoradapter.47043420</eventId> </metaData> <sourceData> <componentHost>clm-aus-018145</componentHost> <componentHostAddress>172.22.231.209</componentHostAddress> </sourceData> <situationData> <situationCategory>CAPACITY_MANAGEMENT</situationCategory> <situationSubCategory>Service Down</situationSubCategory> <application>BAO-REPO</application> <severity>CRITICAL</severity> <situationTimeEpoch>0</situationTimeEpoch> <messageSummary>TESTEVENT02</messageSummary> </situationData> <reporterData> <componentHostAddress>172.22.231.209</componentHostAddress> <eventTime>1520007159</eventTime> </reporterData> <extendedData> <nameValueList> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>cell-name</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">Admin</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>mc-incident-id</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">INC00000111112</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>pem-alert-type</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">Disk Full</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>blah-blah</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">blah</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>mc-event-sub-category</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">Disk Full</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>mc-arrival-time</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">1520007159</value> </nameValue> <nameValue xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="nameValue"> <name>mc-origin-key</name> <value xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xsi:type="xs:string">10</value> </nameValue> </nameValueList> </extendedData> <metricsData /> </event>

Any pre-existing itsm data in the format
<itsm-data> <incident-id>INC11100222</incident-id> </itsm-data>
If Incident ID exists, then, creation of incident is skipped.
If no incident ID exists, then, enter a value as below
<itsm-data /> or leave it empty.

documentation.description: This a process template. It has a few basic things. 1. Log Input 2. Log Output 3. Atleast 2 basic output parameters - status and error message.
